a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Human Development Index vs. Historical Index of Human
The HDI is an index capturing life expectancy, expected and average years of schooling and gross national income
(GNI) per capita and commonly used by the UN as an index measure of development.
The HIHD is based on life expectancy, adult literacy, educational enrollment rates and GDP per capita.
Data source: UNDP, Human Development Report (2021-22); Prados de la Escosura (2018)
